main_definition: Theaters are venues or places where live performances such as plays, musicals, ballets, concerts, or movies take place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A facility for performing arts and entertainment
meanings_and_examples.example: The local theater hosts a variety of shows including Broadway-style musicals, operas, ballets, and plays.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An establishment that provides space for various types of performances
meanings_and_examples.example: Theaters in our city offer an extensive range of events from stand-up comedy to film screenings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A place where movies are shown on a large screen
meanings_and_examples.example: We went to the theater to watch the latest blockbuster movie.
